name: Welcome To The Backrooms
description:
"If you're not careful and you no-clip out of reality in the wrong areas, you'll end up in the Backrooms, where it's nothing but the stink of old moist carpet, the madness of mono-yellow, the endless background noise of fluorescent lights at maximum hum-buzz, and approximately six hundred million square miles of randomly segmented empty rooms to be trapped in.
God save you if you hear something wandering around nearby, because it sure as hell has heard you…"

Everyone knows the tail of the backrooms.. Dive into the backrooms yourself in this Indie horror exploration game where every move you make could mean life or death.

"Welcome to the backrooms" is an infinite maze of rooms that you have to traverse while also being aware of your health (in depth heartrate monitoring, stamina, hunger, thirst, and sanity), entities, anomalies, (WIP) and other reality bending insanity that the backrooms decides to throw at you.

Enter level 0 and become one with the backrooms as you explore every piece of the story engraved on the WikiDot. We have plans to implement the main 9 levels plus even more...? Including the entities that come with them!

Current Features: 

- Level 0 - Infinite maze of rooms with buzzing lights, scary ambience, and a heartrate system! (other health aspects are WIP)

- Random items such as chairs and almond water scattered around (more are WIP)

(Please keep in mind this game has been in development for only 3 weeks)

Plans to Add:

- Level 1 - 9 (and more?)

- All entities that are found in level 1 - 9 (hounds, skin stealers, dullers, smilers, etc.)

- Extremely in depth player health system (Watch to monitor heartrate, steps taken, and audio cues to understand when the player is hungry, thirsty, etc.)

- Journals of other explorers to help aid with understanding the nature of the game
